How to install:

Step 1: Extract all files to wherever you want. I used Winrar. I got some error messages, but it didn't matter.
Step 2: Mount Virgin Roster.mdf to a virtual drive. I use PowerISO, but I'm pretty sure any virtual drive manager should work.
Step 3: Run the newly mounted virtual disc. Install the game.
Step 4: Copy BleedUS.exe from the crack into the folder where you installed the game. If asked, you want to *REPLACE* the file that already exists.
Step 5: Enjoy!
